caption:
This photograph captures a mountainous landscape dominated by dense greenery. The foreground prominently features a thicket of young, conical evergreen trees that seem soft and lush. Beyond this young forest, the middle ground introduces taller, more mature pine trees, standing sparse and straight.

Notably, the background highlights a striking contrast where part of the mountain is heavily deforested. A large section is visibly barren with exposed brown earth, stark against the otherwise wooded environment. The upper part of the deforested area is covered by remnants of fallen trees and debris, suggesting recent logging or a natural disturbance. Above this cleared zone, the remaining mountain top is cloaked with dense, dark green forest, showcasing a typical coniferous woodland.

The mood of the image is serene yet somber, underscored by the natural beauty of the forest against the harsh reality of deforestation. The composition effectively juxtaposes the vitality of the younger trees against the vulnerability of the landscape subjected to human or natural impact.
title: Road cut results in erosion in olympic national timberland Washington.  Near Olympic National Park
